alert.note: Alert for Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 2:24PM CDT until June 30 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Randall County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southern Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 224 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mescalero Park, or near Canyon, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Canyon, Lake Tanglewood, Mescalero Park, Bushland and Timbercreek Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
